languages.text: "А я летал до Атриума, проповедь слушать. Там всякое говорили. Но в основном — "мы обречены, обречены, обречены".
"And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"
languages.original_text: "А я летал до Атриума, проповедь слушать. Там всякое говорили. Но в основном — "мы обречены, обречены, обречены".

traits.locale_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed'."
"And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed'."
"And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"
"And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"
"And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

languages.text: “当时我在中庭，听了一场布道。他们说了些什么，但主要的意思是说，我们已经‘在劫难逃、在劫难逃、在劫难逃’了。”
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: “当时我在中庭，听了一场布道。他们说了些什么，但主要的意思是说，我们已经‘在劫难逃、在劫难逃、在劫难逃’了。”

languages.text: «Y estaba en el Atrio escuchando un sermón. Dijeron muchas cosas... principalmente, que estamos condenados, condenados y condenados».
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: «Y estaba en el Atrio escuchando un sermón. Dijeron muchas cosas... principalmente, que estamos condenados, condenados y condenados».

languages.text: 「それからアトリウムで説教を聞いた。何か言ってたな。まぁ大体が俺達は『終わり、終わり、終わり』って話だった」
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: 「それからアトリウムで説教を聞いた。何か言ってたな。まぁ大体が俺達は『終わり、終わり、終わり』って話だった」

languages.text: "Und ich war im Atrium und habe mir eine Predigt angehört. Dabei wurde viel gesagt. Aber hauptsächlich, dass wir alle 'verdammt, verdammt, verdammt' sind."
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: "Und ich war im Atrium und habe mir eine Predigt angehört. Dabei wurde viel gesagt. Aber hauptsächlich, dass wir alle 'verdammt, verdammt, verdammt' sind."

languages.text: « Et j'étais à l'Atrium, à écouter un sermon. Ils ont raconté plein de trucs, bien sûr, mais j'ai surtout retenu qu'on était tous condamnés. »
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: « Et j'étais à l'Atrium, à écouter un sermon. Ils ont raconté plein de trucs, bien sûr, mais j'ai surtout retenu qu'on était tous condamnés. »

languages.text: "Atriyum'da söylev dinliyordum. Bir sürü şey söylediler ama en çok da 'sonumuz geldi, sonumuz geldi, sonumuz geldi' dediler."
languages.original_text: "And I was at the Atrium, listening to a sermon. They said things. But mostly just that we're 'doomed, doomed, doomed.'"

traits.locale_text: "Atriyum'daydım, söylev dinliyordum. Bir sürü şey söylediler ama çoğunlukla söyledikleri şey 'sonumuz geldi, sonumuz geldi, sonumuz geldi' idi."
